item.description:
We'll be discussing "Checking out of 'Hotel America'." This was written by a correspondent for the BBC. The article is his musings on the United States after reporting from Washington for several years.

Here's a link to the article:
http://news.bbc.co.uk...

Please read it and bring your questions, comments, and opinions to the conversation group.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send more details to people who say they are coming.

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Conversation Group: Checking out of 'Hotel America'
